h2.a: Find a food pantry in your area.

font-family: Castellar;
color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
font-family: Castellar; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(47, 84, 150); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold;

p.span: How are you and your students doing?

span.style: color: rgb(47, 84, 150); font-family: "Arial Black"; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold;
color: rgb(47, 84, 150); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Arial Black"; font-weight: bold;

p.span: Do you have a need for resources such as food or medications?

span.style: color: rgb(47, 84, 150); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Arial Black"; font-weight: bold;

p.span: Do you have questions about your child’s health?

span.style: color: rgb(47, 84, 150); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Arial Black"; font-weight: bold;

p.span: If so, how can we contact you?

span.style: color: rgb(47, 84, 150); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Arial Black"; font-weight: bold;

p.span: You can reach out to the school nurse through this private email:

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Arial Black"; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline;
color: red; font-family: "Arial Black"; font-weight: bold;

p.span: Leave a message with your students’ name and campus and we will

span.style: color: red; font-family: "Arial Black"; font-weight: bold;
font-size: 16px;

br.br: 15 ways we can help our kids who are worried about COVID-19

span.style: background-color: rgb(255, 0, 0); color: rgb(255, 255, 0);
background-color: rgb(255, 0, 0); color: rgb(255, 255, 0);

a.title: cdc
a.strong: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

span.style: text-align: center; font-size: 13px;

p.span: Benefits.gov • The outbreak of the COVID-19 (coronavirus) has put many citizens in a place of uncertainty -- Benefits.gov is here to help! In order to help families and individuals find the resources they need, Benefits.gov has released a new article, "Finding the Right Help during the COVID-19 (coronavirus) Outbreak". In the article, you will find helpful information on government benefits such as unemployment resources and healthcare coverage as well as resources for businesses and families. • For the most up-to-date information on the coronavirus outbreak, visit Coronavirus.gov to learn more about how to protect and prepare yourself and your community.

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.span: Attention students: We are asking you to notify us confidentially by email if any of these statements apply to you:

span.style: background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.3px; line-height: 23px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap;
p.em: 1) I am personally exhibiting COVID-19 symptoms.

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.3px; line-height: 23px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap;
p.em: 2) I have tested positive for COVID-19.

p.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.3px; line-height: 23px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap;
p.em: 3) Someone in my immediate circle has tested positive for COVID-19 that I have been in close contact with.

span.style: background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

em.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.em: If the answer is 'yes', please send us a confidential email to COVID19@bobhopeschool.org. Be sure to include your name and grade level and let us know which statement(s) apply to you. This callout statement will be posted on our website. Again, the email address is: COVID19@bobhopeschool.org (no hyphen!) Thank you.

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
span.br:
Atención estudiantes: le pedimos que nos notifique confidencialmente por correo electrónico si alguna de estas declaraciones se aplica a usted:
1) Estoy exhibiendo personalmente los síntomas de COVID-19.
2) He dado positivo por COVID-19.
3) Alguien en mi círculo inmediato ha dado positivo por COVID-19 con el que he estado en contacto cercano.
Si la respuesta es 'sí', envíenos un correo electrónico confidencial a COVID19@bobhopeschool.org. Asegúrese de incluir su nombre y nivel de grado y háganos saber qué declaraciones se aplican a usted. Esta declaración de llamada se publicará en nuestro sitio web. Nuevamente, la dirección de correo electrónico es: COVID19@bobhopeschool.org (¡sin guión!) Gracias.

p.style: color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.3px; line-height: 23px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; text-align: center;
p.em: Attention staff: We are asking you to notify us confidentially by email if any of these statements apply to you:
